settings.description: Whether you're thanking clients, welcoming new hires, or celebrating milestones, our curated gift sets offer a refined blend of beauty, fragrance, and function—crafted to elevate every space they touch.

settings.title: Choose your gift set
settings.text: Select from our curated bundles or build a custom assortment—perfect for clients, new hires, or team celebrations. Each set is thoughtfully composed with our most loved luxury homecare products.

settings.title: Add Your Personal Touch
settings.text: Include a note, custom ribbon, or branded card. Every detail can be tailored to reflect your company’s voice and values.

settings.title: Gifts That Arrive Ready to Impress
settings.text: Each order is hand-packed with care, beautifully boxed, and shipped directly to your recipients. No extra wrapping needed—just a perfect unboxing experience, every time.

settings.title: Cleaner Gifting for a Cleaner Planet
settings.text: Every product is made with non-toxic, vegan, and cruelty-free ingredients—formulated with organic fragrance oils and consciously packaged.

settings.title: MorE Than a Gift. It’s a GesTurE.
settings.text: Leave a lasting impression with homecare gifts that speak volumes—crafted with intention, clean formulations, and custom fragrance blends.

settings.title: Signature Fragrance Experience
settings.text: World-renowned perfumers, our scents elevate daily rituals into sensory moments.

settings.title: Clean & Conscious
settings.text: Non-toxic, vegan, cruelty-free, and packaged with sustainability in mind.

settings.title: Premium Formulations
settings.text: From our surface cleaner to hand cream, each product is powered by organic ingredients.

settings.title: Quality at the Core
settings.text: Meeting highest standards: organic, non-toxic, made for design-conscious homes.

settings.description: Each Homecourt set is more than a gesture, it’s a fragrant reflection of your brand’s care, crafted with clean ingredients, luxury formulations, and deep intention.

settings.title: DiscOveR our beSt-selLing sets for home and body.

settings.author: Sophie M.
settings.title: Elegance in Every Drop
settings.description: I ordered the rose-steeped dishwashing liquid, hand soap, and surface cleaner. Everything looks and smells amazing!

settings.author: Daniel R.
settings.title: Makes Cleaning a Joy
settings.description: Didn’t think I’d ever be excited about dish soap, but here we are. Beautiful packaging and scent.

settings.author: Carla S.
settings.title: So Worth It!
settings.description: These products make my kitchen feel like a spa. They lift my spirits every time I use them.

settings.author: Luis F.
settings.title: Stylish and Effective
settings.description: They look great on the counter and perform better than most supermarket brands I’ve tried.

settings.quote: I wanted to create something that not only works but looks beautiful on your counter. Homecourt is about elevating everyday routines into something special.
